stories.title: Accurate artifact error reporting
stories.story: As a phase agent encountering a gate block, I want the error message to list ALL valid artifact variants that would satisfy the requirement, so that I know exactly which file(s) I can create to resolve the block.

stories.title: Version lock enforcement for unversioned writes
stories.story: As the state integrity system, I want to block unversioned state writes when the disk state is versioned, so that the version lock cannot be bypassed by omitting the state_version field.

stories.title: Backward-compatible migration handling
stories.story: As a project migrating from unversioned to versioned state, I want the state-write-validator to allow unversioned writes when the disk is also unversioned, so that migration is not blocked.
